languages.text: {n}Заметив ваш взгляд, Хейнрикс усмехается:{/n} "Не обращай внимания. Просто тяжелые внутренние повреждения требуют особой собранности и кропотливости. Я почти пришел в себя. По крайней мере, мышечные усилия перестали приносить острую боль".

traits.locale_text: {n}Заметив ваш взгляд, Хейнрикс усмехается:{/n} "Не обращай внимания. Просто тяжелые внутренние повреждения требуют особой собранности и кропотливости. Я почти пришел в себя. По крайней мере, мышечные усилия перестали приносить острую боль".

languages.text: {n}Noticing your examination, Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "Pay no attention. Serious internal injuries require particular focus and painstaking effort to remedy, that's all. I'm almost as good as new. Moving is no longer excruciating, at least."
languages.original_text: {n}Заметив ваш взгляд, Хейнрикс усмехается:{/n} "Не обращай внимания. Просто тяжелые внутренние повреждения требуют особой собранности и кропотливости. Я почти пришел в себя. По крайней мере, мышечные усилия перестали приносить острую боль".

traits.locale_text: {n}Noticing your examination, Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "Pay no attention. Serious internal injuries require particular focus and painstaking effort to remedy, that's all. I'm almost as good as new. Moving is no longer excruciating, at least."

{n}Noticing your examination, Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "Pay no attention. Serious internal injuries require particular focus and painstaking effort to remedy, that's all. I'm almost as good as new. Moving is no longer excruciating, at least."

{n}Noticing your examination, Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "Pay no attention. Serious internal injuries require particular focus and painstaking effort to remedy, that's all. I'm almost as good as new. Moving is no longer excruciating, at least."

{n}Noticing your examination, Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "Pay no attention. Serious internal injuries require particular focus and painstaking effort to remedy, that's all. I'm almost as good as new. Moving is no longer excruciating, at least."

languages.text: {n}海因里希注意到了你的目光，喘着粗气笑了起来。{/n}“不必在意，若是想治好严重的内伤，需要花费相当程度的精力。不过，也就是仅此而已。我几乎已经恢复如初了，至少走路什么的已经不再让我那么痛苦了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Noticing your examination, Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "Pay no attention. Serious internal injuries require particular focus and painstaking effort to remedy, that's all. I'm almost as good as new. Moving is no longer excruciating, at least."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希注意到了你的目光，喘着粗气笑了起来。{/n}“不必在意，若是想治好严重的内伤，需要花费相当程度的精力。不过，也就是仅此而已。我几乎已经恢复如初了，至少走路什么的已经不再让我那么痛苦了。”

languages.text: {n}Al fijarse en tu mirada, Heinrix ríe en voz baja.{/n} «No se preocupe. Para arreglar las heridas internas necesito concentrarme y ser meticuloso, pero eso es todo. Casi estoy como nuevo. Por lo menos moverme ya no es una tortura insoportable».
languages.original_text: {n}Noticing your examination, Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "Pay no attention. Serious internal injuries require particular focus and painstaking effort to remedy, that's all. I'm almost as good as new. Moving is no longer excruciating, at least."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al fijarse en tu mirada, Heinrix ríe en voz baja.{/n} «No se preocupe. Para arreglar las heridas internas necesito concentrarme y ser meticuloso, pero eso es todo. Casi estoy como nuevo. Por lo menos moverme ya no es una tortura insoportable».

languages.text: {n}探るようなあなたに気付き、ハインリックスは息を殺して笑った。{/n}「気にしないでくれ。重傷の内蔵を治療するには特別な集中力と骨の折れる努力が必要なんだ。今では、ほとんど新品同様だ。少なくとも、動くことはもう耐え難いことではない」
languages.original_text: {n}Noticing your examination, Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "Pay no attention. Serious internal injuries require particular focus and painstaking effort to remedy, that's all. I'm almost as good as new. Moving is no longer excruciating, at least."

traits.locale_text: {n}探るようなあなたに気付き、ハインリックスは息を殺して笑った。{/n}「気にしないでくれ。重傷の内蔵を治療するには特別な集中力と骨の折れる努力が必要なんだ。今では、ほとんど新品同様だ。少なくとも、動くことはもう耐え難いことではない」

languages.text: {n}Remarquant que vous l'examinez, Heinrix pousse un petit rire.{/n} « Ne faites pas attention à moi. Les blessures internes graves nécessitent une concentration intense et des efforts considérables, c'est tout. Je serai bientôt comme neuf. Au moins, je ne souffre plus le martyre au moindre mouvement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Noticing your examination, Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "Pay no attention. Serious internal injuries require particular focus and painstaking effort to remedy, that's all. I'm almost as good as new. Moving is no longer excruciating, at least."

traits.locale_text: {n}Remarquant que vous l'examinez, Heinrix pousse un petit rire.{/n} « Ne faites pas attention à moi. Les blessures internes graves nécessitent une concentration intense et des efforts considérables, c'est tout. Je serai bientôt comme neuf. Au moins, je ne souffre plus le martyre au moindre mouvement. »

languages.text: {n}Als Heinrix bemerkt, dass du ihn untersuchst, lacht er ganz leise.{/n} "Beachtet mich gar nicht. Schwerwiegende innere Verletzungen bedürfen besonderer Aufmerksamkeit und mühsame Anstrengungen, um zu heilen, das ist alles. Ich bin schon fast wieder der Alte. Immerhin fühlt sich Bewegen nicht mehr an wie die reinste Qual."
languages.original_text: {n}Noticing your examination, Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "Pay no attention. Serious internal injuries require particular focus and painstaking effort to remedy, that's all. I'm almost as good as new. Moving is no longer excruciating, at least."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Heinrix bemerkt, dass du ihn untersuchst, lacht er ganz leise.{/n} "Beachtet mich gar nicht. Schwerwiegende innere Verletzungen bedürfen besonderer Aufmerksamkeit und mühsame Anstrengungen, um zu heilen, das ist alles. Ich bin schon fast wieder der Alte. Immerhin fühlt sich Bewegen nicht mehr an wie die reinste Qual."

languages.text: {n}Onu incelediğini fark eden Heinrix, belli belirsiz kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Durumuma aldırma. İçteki yaralarımın ciddi olanlarını iyileştirmem için bilhassa odaklanmam ve titiz bir çaba sarf etmem gerekiyor, hepsi bu. Turp gibi sayılırım. En azından hareket etmek, eziyet gibi gelmiyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Noticing your examination, Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "Pay no attention. Serious internal injuries require particular focus and painstaking effort to remedy, that's all. I'm almost as good as new. Moving is no longer excruciating, at least."
